title: The Demolition of Berkley Hall - Ghost Story
description: Sam Freeman, owner of Phoenix Demolition and Renovation Services, wins a contract to demolish the run down stately home of Berkley Hall. He and his team arrive on Monday morning to start removing anything that could be sold or used in other renovations before the wrecking ball arrives. As work gets underway things start to go wrong and they become aware that demolishing this building is not going to be as straight forward as they first thought.A ghost story - novelette in length.
author: Andy Downs
